law.text: The authority may accept and expend moneys which may be appropriated from time to time by the General Assembly, or moneys which may be received from any source, including income from the authority's operations for effectuating its purpose, including, without limitation, the payment of the expenses of administration and operation.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 359, sec. 7, effective July 14, 1992.
